languages.text: "Навешивание запретов на непонятное не похоже на познание. Технология — лишь инструмент, и мудрый владелец сможет применить его без риска".

traits.locale_text: "Навешивание запретов на непонятное не похоже на познание. Технология — лишь инструмент, а как применить ее, решает ее владелец".

languages.text: "Banning things you cannot understand is the opposite of seeking knowledge. Technology is merely a tool that can be employed without risk by a wise wielder."
languages.original_text: "Навешивание запретов на непонятное не похоже на познание. Технология — лишь инструмент, и мудрый владелец сможет применить его без риска".

traits.locale_text: "Banning things you cannot understand is the opposite of seeking knowledge. Technology is merely a tool, and it is the owner who decides how to apply it."
"Banning things you cannot understand is the opposite of seeking knowledge. Technology is merely a tool, and it is the owner who decides how to apply it."
"Banning things you cannot understand is the opposite of seeking knowledge. Technology is merely a tool. The one who wields it decides how it is used."
"Banning things you cannot understand is the opposite of seeking knowledge. Technology is merely a tool. The one who wields it decides how it is used."
"Banning things you cannot understand is the opposite of seeking knowledge. Technology is merely a tool that can be employed without risk by a wise wielder."

languages.text: «Prohibir lo que no se consigue entender es lo opuesto a la búsqueda de conocimiento. La tecnología es solo una herramienta que puede emplearse sin ningún riesgo cuando uno sabe cómo manejarla».
languages.original_text: "Banning things you cannot understand is the opposite of seeking knowledge. Technology is merely a tool that can be employed without risk by a wise wielder."

traits.locale_text: «Prohibir lo que no se consigue entender es lo opuesto a la búsqueda de conocimiento. La tecnología es solo una herramienta que puede emplearse sin ningún riesgo cuando uno sabe cómo manejarla».

languages.text: 「理解できないものを禁じるのは、知識を追求することと相反している。技術とは、賢明な使い手によってリスクなく使用できる道具にすぎない」
languages.original_text: "Banning things you cannot understand is the opposite of seeking knowledge. Technology is merely a tool that can be employed without risk by a wise wielder."

traits.locale_text: 「理解できないものを禁じるのは、知識を追求することと相反している。技術とは、賢明な使い手によってリスクなく使用できる道具にすぎない」

languages.text: “‘禁绝一切无法理解的事物’是求知的反义词。技术只是一种工具，明智之人可以毫无风险地使用这种工具。”
languages.original_text: "Banning things you cannot understand is the opposite of seeking knowledge. Technology is merely a tool that can be employed without risk by a wise wielder."

traits.locale_text: “‘禁绝一切无法理解的事物’是求知的反义词。技术只是一种工具，明智之人可以毫无风险地使用这种工具。”

languages.text: « Bannir ce que l'on ne comprend pas est l'opposé de la quête de la connaissance. La technologie n'est qu'un outil qui peut être utilisé sans risque par le sage. »
languages.original_text: "Banning things you cannot understand is the opposite of seeking knowledge. Technology is merely a tool that can be employed without risk by a wise wielder."

traits.locale_text: « Bannir ce que l'on ne comprend pas est l'opposé de la quête de la connaissance. La technologie n'est qu'un outil qui peut être utilisé sans risque par le sage. »

languages.text: "Dinge zu verbieten, die man nicht versteht ... wie passt das zum Streben nach Wissen? Es ist das genaue Gegenteil. Technologie ist lediglich ein Werkzeug, das von einem geschickten Anwender ohne Risiko eingesetzt werden kann."
languages.original_text: "Banning things you cannot understand is the opposite of seeking knowledge. Technology is merely a tool that can be employed without risk by a wise wielder."

traits.locale_text: "Dinge zu verbieten, die man nicht versteht ... wie passt das zum Streben nach Wissen? Es ist das genaue Gegenteil. Technologie ist lediglich ein Werkzeug, das von einem geschickten Anwender ohne Risiko eingesetzt werden kann."

languages.text: "Anlayamadığın şeyi yasaklamak, bilgi arayışının tam tersi bir eylemdir. Teknoloji, bilgi sahibi bir kimsenin risksizce kullanabileceği bir araçtan ibarettir."
languages.original_text: "Banning things you cannot understand is the opposite of seeking knowledge. Technology is merely a tool that can be employed without risk by a wise wielder."

traits.locale_text: "Anlayamadığın şeyi yasaklamak, bilgi arayışının tam tersi bir eylemdir. Teknoloji, bilgi sahibi bir kişi tarafından risksiz bir şekilde kullanılabilecek bir araçtan başka bir şey değildir."
